content: jack evil @hookforahandicraft presents the ccaannddyy ccoorrnn ggrraannnnyy ssqquuaarree @hookforahandicraft materials for a 5x5 square use worsted recommended colors weight yarn in 4 colors red heart super saver in 4 mm hook white black saffron and carrot yarn needle abbreviations and terminology us uk st/sts stitch/stitches - single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half treble_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet double treble_crochet tips and tricks when working color changes yarn should be carried along the bottom of your stitch the top of the previous row to decrease visibility when starting a new row in the round be sure to catch any colors you are carrying in the first stitch of the new row this will help keep the back of your work looking tidy always pull your current color to the back of your work or wrong side when switching to a new color to keep the look of your stitches consistent when changing color on a double_crochet stitch pull your current color through the first two loops of your stitch then switch to your new color to finish the upper portion of the double_crochet your initial chain when starting each row is not considered a stand alone stitch it is the right post of your first single or double_crochet similarly the space where you join the row does not count as a stitch this is to keep the join for each row from gaping notes all us terminology please credit jack evil @hookforahandicraft when posting on social media this pattern is intended for personal use only and not to be posted for resale or public use this pattern should not be included in larger works for resale or distribution without the author s consent items made to white 3dc in next st change color to black double_crochet in next st 3 times change color to white 3dc in last st change color to black to finish last st and join round 16dc r3 with black chain 2 double_crochet into first st change color to white double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next st change color to black 2dc in next st 3 times change color to white double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next st change color to black double_crochet in first st of the round with initial ch2 and join round cut white leaving a tail to weave in 24dc r4 with black chain 2 2dc in first st change color to orange double_crochet in next 2 sts 2dc in next st double_crochet in next st change color to black double_crochet in next st 2dc in next
